data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mermudes, José Ricardo M. (2015): A new genus and two new species of Araecerini from high elevation in the Andes with a synopsis of the tribe in South America (Coleoptera, Anthribidae, Choraginae). Zootaxa 3918 (4): 587-593, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3918.4.8
